alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 08 at 8:26PM MST until January 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Highlands zone, along Idaho Highway 51. * WHEN...From 11 AM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions. Whiteout conditions will cause dangerous travel. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
